name: Date Tattoo Artist Gaara
description:
Date Jas's Tattoo Artist AU Gaara in this cute VN!
Warning: he talks about Shinki a lot and it's really cute. 

--

This VN was created to be a sample for our Coloured VN Commissions.
Like the base package, it includes:

  • 1 sprite with 4 expressions
  • ~1500 words and 3 choices
  • 1 ending
  • a title screen from one of our templates
  • + one asset with variations ($ 30)
  • + a coloured detailed BG ($ 50)

This VN commission would cost $ 335.

--

If you would like to commission us to make a VN for you, please click here!

--

Due to server issues, the game might be slow when playing with browser.
If the browser version of the game is too slow, please download the .zip file to play it on your device.

--

Credits:
Story, Coding and AU Character - jassydaPOO

Gaara from Naruto
